"Astarte": "You have met the requirements for your next stamp card. Here you go."
"You are to meet Zieg who is just beyond the Teleporters in the Shop Area."
"From the Gate Area, these teleporters are located beside the Quest Counters."
"From the Shop Area, these are the teleporters against the outside walls."
"If you have already completed this objective, you will automatically be awarded a stamp."
